Reviews.Title: Super Television
Reviews.Author: Irish Gal
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV for a few years and it is wonderful.  It's not very big, but it packs a big punch.  I have never had any problems with it and it's been moved long distances and still is reliable.  The picture is great.  I have no complaints.  I didn't trust Polaroid products and was very leery of purchasing this, but now I have no regrets.

Reviews.Title: absolutely awful
Reviews.Author: PAUL BRYAN HENSLEY
Reviews.Content: wrong circuitry installed.  chipset is for a 22 inch monitor installed on an 19 inch screen so the lower left section cannot be seen.  cannot adjust to correct.  even had dirt and grease on it when i received it.  just throwing it away.  do not buy "refurbished" items from this seller.
